heartReality.question: Someone texts "I miss you 😔" but {name} just stares at the screen, feeling hollow inside...
heartReality.englishHint: What do you think when someone misses you but you feel nothing?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Koi kehta hai 'miss you' par andar kuch feel hi nahi hota... Tere dil mein woh khaali-pan kyun hai? 💔😶

options.text: "I should fake a sweet reply, right?" 🎭
"Do I even remember how to miss someone?" 🤔
"Cute... but I need my space, yaar." 🧊
"Want to reply but fingers feel heavy AF." 📱

heartReality.question: 3AM thoughts: What's {name}'s real definition of love now?
heartReality.englishHint: How has your view of love evolved through your experiences?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Aadhi raat ko jab neend nahi aati, tab pyaar ka matlab kya lagta hai tujhe? Pehle jaisa ya bilkul badal gaya? 💭❤️‍🩹

options.text: Silent respect that feels like home. 🏡
Chaotic passion that consumes everything! 🔥
A fantasy that novels and films lied about. 🥀
Peaceful understanding without drama. 🧘

heartReality.question: {name} checks their sent messages - all blue ticks, no replies. Again, you're left hanging...
heartReality.englishHint: How do you handle one-sided connections?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Hamesha tu hi message karta hai... Wo sirf blue ticks deta hai. Dil pe kya beetti hai teri? 📲💔

options.text: Abruptly stop - they need to feel your absence. 🛑
Triple text for closure - neend nahi aayegi warna. 📲
Ghost them silently - dikh ke bhi na dikhunga. 👻
Send a relatable meme and emotionally detach. 🎮

heartReality.question: {name} gets hot messages at night, but daytime replies are cold AF. The confusion is killing you...
heartReality.englishHint: How do you handle people who show inconsistent interest?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Raat ko 'baby I miss you' aur din mein cold replies. Yeh mixed signals se dimaag ka bharta ban raha hai, ab kya karein? 🧊🔥

options.text: Overthink every word looking for hidden clues 🔍
Confront directly - "Seedhe batao, kya chal raha hai?" 📣
Match their energy - hot-cold khel lenge hum bhi 🧊🔥
Nikal lo - life's too short for ye drama 👋

heartReality.question: After 2 years together, {name} realizes the butterflies are gone. Now it's just... comfortable silence.
heartReality.englishHint: What does it mean when relationship excitement fades?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Woh pehle wali feeling gayab ho gayi hai. Dil mein woh butterflies nahin rahe. Kya pyaar badal gaya ya khatam ho gaya? 🦋❤️‍🩹

options.text: This is real love - not just excitement ka nasha 🧠
Time for surprise dates - woh purana spark wapas laana hai 🔥
Maybe it's time to let go - ye rishta thak gaya hai 🚶
Do I actually know what love feels like? 🤔

heartReality.question: {name}'s phone lights up with an ex's name after months. Your heart feels...
heartReality.englishHint: What emotions surface when an ex suddenly returns?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Ex ka message dekh ke dil mein kaisa toofan aaya? Ya kuch bhi feel nahi hua? Woh purani yaadein abhi bhi dil mein zinda hain? 👻💔

options.text: Dead inside - jaise koi anjaan ka message ho ⏰
Nostalgia and warning bells dono ek saath 🦋⚠️
Mild curiosity - jaise purani film dekh rahe ho 🎬
Peaceful - we've both grown, no regrets 🔍

heartReality.question: {name} catches feelings but is terrified of another heartbreak. You're frozen between desire and fear...
heartReality.englishHint: How do you handle falling for someone when you fear getting hurt?
heartReality.hinglishHint: Dil chahta hai lekin darr bhi lagta hai. Ek aur heartbreak se toote dil ko sambhalna mushkil hoga. Kya karein? 💓😨

options.text: Keep a safe distance - protection mode on 🛡️
Dive in fully - zindagi hai, risk lene padenge 🏊
Give subtle hints but keep escape route ready 🚪
Ignore feelings until they hopefully disappear 🙈

bondInsight.question: {name}'s so-called "best friend" messages only when they need help. After months of silence, they ask for another favor...
bondInsight.englishHint: How do you handle friends who only appear when they need something?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Woh 'dost' jo sirf zaroorat padne par hi yaad karte hain. Baar-baar aise use hone par dil mein kya feelings aati hain? 💉🤨

options.text: Help them, par dil pe chot lagti hai. 💉
Read karo, ghuma ke jawab do. Let them chase. 🙃
"Bro main tera backup plan nahi hoon." Clear kar do. 🔋
Dheere dheere distance banao, drama nahi chahiye. 🌫️

bondInsight.question: {name} sees Instagram stories of all friends on a trip. You weren't even told about it...
bondInsight.englishHint: How do you process feeling excluded by your friend group?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Saare dost ghumne gaye, tujhe bataya tak nahi. Stories dekhkar pata chala. Andar se kaisa feel ho raha hai? 📱😕

options.text: Joke it off on group chat - "maza aaya hoga 😂"
Scroll through feeling empty inside. 😶
Muted stories - andar hi andar jalan hoti hai. 🔥
Plan your own adventure - main khud ki vibe hu. 🌟

bondInsight.question: Looking at old photos, {name} realizes it's been months since you genuinely connected with any friend...
bondInsight.englishHint: How does friendship isolation affect you emotionally?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Kitne mahine ho gaye kisi dost ke saath dil kholkar hasne ko? Yaadein toh hain, par aaj tera koi sachcha dost hai? 🫂🥺

options.text: Maybe main hi badal gaya/gayi hoon... 🦋
I just need one real yaar. Quantity nahi, quality. 🫂
Who has time for friendships? Life busy hai. 📅
Depressing realization. Kahan reh gaye sab? 😶‍🌫️

bondInsight.question: {name} stares at the group chat flooding with memes but zero meaningful conversation for weeks...
bondInsight.englishHint: How do you deal with superficial friendship interactions?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Group chat mein sirf memes aur forwards hai. Koi real baat nahi hoti. Kya yeh dosti hai ya timepass? 📱🎭

options.text: Keep sharing memes - deep baatein overrated hain 🎭
"Guys, life mein kya chal raha hai?" Throw a real question 🎣
Silent observer - padhke exit kar lena 👀
DM one close friend separately - selective depth 💬

bondInsight.question: After 5 years, {name} bumps into a childhood friend at a café. The moment feels...
bondInsight.englishHint: What's your emotional experience with unexpected reconnections?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Bachpan ka dost achanak mil gaya cafe mein. Purani yaadein, naye chehre. Kaisa laga unse dobara milkar? 👥🕰️

options.text: Awkward - strangers with memories ban gaye hain 👥
Nostalgic but hollow - woh waqt wapas nahi aayega 📸
Instantly comfortable - kuch rishtey kabhi nahi tootte 🔄
Fascinating - life journeys compare karne mein maza aaya 📺

bondInsight.question: {name}'s phone keeps buzzing with messages but your soul feels completely drained...
bondInsight.englishHint: How do you balance social obligations with emotional exhaustion?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Phone notifications se dimaag phat raha hai, par reply karne ki energy nahi bachi. Social battery zero hai. Ab kya? 🔋😩

options.text: One-word replies - obligatory response dena padega 🔤
"Busy hoon" message - white lie for peace 🥱
Do Not Disturb mode - mental peace first 🔋
Force yourself to chat - FOMO se darr lagta hai 😬

bondInsight.question: Your friend betrayed {name}'s trust, sharing your personal secret with others. Your heart feels...
bondInsight.englishHint: How do you process betrayal from someone you trusted?
bondInsight.hinglishHint: Jis dost pe bharosa kiya, usne teri personal baat sabko bata di. Vishwas toot gaya. Dil mein kya chal raha hai? 💔🤐

options.text: Confront directly - "How could you do this?" 😠
Ghost completely - trust breakers deserve silence 👻
Give second chance - har insaan galti karta hai 🕊️
Pretend it's fine but never share again 🎭

workPsyche.question: While everyone's hustling 24/7, {name} watches from the sidelines, thinking...
workPsyche.englishHint: What's your authentic stance on career advancement pressure?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: Sab log bhag-daud mein lage hain, success ke peeche. Tu kya soch raha hai apne career ko lekar? Saccha jawab de. 🏃‍♂️💭

options.text: Slow growth is also growth - meri apni speed hai. 🌱
YOLO - success se zyada peace of mind important hai. 😎
Plans toh bohot hain, execution mein problem hai. 😅
Building my empire brick by brick - no shortcuts. 🧱

workPsyche.question: The dreaded interview question hits {name}: "Where do you see yourself in 5 years?" Your mind goes...
workPsyche.englishHint: What's your honest vision of your future compared to what you tell others?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: "5 saal baad kahan dekhte ho khud ko?" - Interviewer ka yeh sawal sunke dimag mein kya REAL thoughts aate hain? 🤔⏱️

options.text: "Hopefully on a better chair with better snacks." 🍪
"WFH in pajamas, making more with less stress." 🧦
"Honestly? Just surviving capitalism, bro." 💀
"Building my own venture - independent hona hai." 💼

workPsyche.question: {name} has dreams of success but hasn't opened the laptop in days. The guilt is building...
workPsyche.englishHint: How do you reconcile big ambitions with procrastination reality?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: Bade sapne hain par kaam start karne ka mann hi nahi karta. Iss guilt aur procrastination se kaise deal karta hai? 💤🚀

options.text: "Creative break hai - dimaag recharge ho raha hai." 💤
Scroll, feel guilty, repeat - toxic cycle hai. 📱
"Kal pakka start karunga" - classic postponement. 🌴
"Planning phase" - execution se pehle sochna zaroori hai. 🧠

workPsyche.question: Colleague brags: "Haven't slept properly in weeks, grinding 24/7!" {name} thinks...
workPsyche.englishHint: What's your authentic reaction to hustle culture glorification?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: Log apni busy life ki shekhi bagharte hain. "No sleep, only hustle!" sunke tere mann mein kya REAL thoughts aate hain? 😴💼

options.text: "Weird flex but ok" - work-life balance is smarter 🧘
"Kya main lazy hoon?" *guilt and anxiety start* 😰
"That's inspiring!" - grind culture ka fan hoon 💯
"Sounds unhealthy AF" - not impressed at all 🥱

workPsyche.question: {name} opens the rejection email from dream company. Your immediate reaction is...
workPsyche.englishHint: How do career disappointments affect your self-perception?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: Dream job se rejection email aaya hai. Pehla reaction kya hai? Dil mein sachchi feeling kya hai iss waqt? 📧💔

options.text: "Their loss honestly" - confidence remains unshaken 💪
Analyze feedback obsessively - next time perfect hona hai 🔍
Feel like trash but apply to 10 more companies anyway 📑
"Is this even my right path?" - existential doubt 🤷

workPsyche.question: While teammates compete fiercely, {name} maintains a relaxed pace. This makes you feel...
workPsyche.englishHint: How does resisting workplace competition culture affect your identity?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: Office mein sab competition mein lage hain, par tu apni pace se kaam kar raha hai. Isse tere mann mein kaisa feel hota hai? 🏢🧘

options.text: Centered - meri journey, meri marzi 🧘
Strategic - jab sab burnout honge, main fresh rahunga 🧠
Mixed feelings - kabhi confident, kabhi insecure 🌊
FOMO - kya main peeche reh jaunga? 😬

workPsyche.question: {name} secretly dreams of quitting the 9-5 grind, but financial fears keep you trapped...
workPsyche.englishHint: How do you handle the tension between security and freedom in career choices?
workPsyche.hinglishHint: 9-5 job se bore ho gaya hai, kuch aur karna hai, par paise ki tension hai. Yeh financial fear aur freedom ki chahat ke beech kya karta hai? 💰🦅

options.text: Side-hustle by night - risk kam, potential zyada 🌙
Save aggressively for the escape - freedom fund 💸
Just daydream but take no action - safe zone 💭
Upskill while employed - better options dhund raha hoon 📚

innerEcho.question: People call {name} "the calm one." But if they could see inside your mind...
innerEcho.englishHint: How different is your internal world from what others perceive?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Bahar se shaant dikhte ho, par andar ka toofan koi nahi jaanta. Dimaag mein kya chal raha hai actually? 😌→😱

options.text: Andar se cheekh rahe hain, bahar se smile kar rahe hain. 😱
10 thoughts per second - dimaag racing car hai. 🏃‍♂️
Silently analyzing everything and everyone. 🦅
Actually calm inside too - main sach mein zen hoon. 😌

innerEcho.question: {name} writes deep poetic messages but speaks in memes and one-liners in person...
innerEcho.englishHint: Why is there such contrast between your written and verbal expression?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Messages mein Ghalib, real life mein memer. Yeh do personalities ke beech kya connection hai? Text aur talk mein itna fark kyun? 📝🗣️

options.text: Different contexts, different versions of me. 🔄
Text mein brave, real life mein shy. 🎭
It's all a performance - authenticity kahan hai? 🎬
That's just my unique wiring - complex personality. 🤷

innerEcho.question: During a quiet moment alone, {name} realizes your true default emotional state is...
innerEcho.englishHint: What's your baseline emotional state when nobody's watching?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Jab koi nahi dekh raha, tab tera natural mood kya hota hai? Bina filter ke, tera asli mood kya hai akele mein? 🧘💭

options.text: Productive but constantly exhausted. 💻
Creatively restless with deep thoughts. 🎮
Outwardly peaceful, inwardly overthinking everything. 🧘
Complete confusion wrapped in false confidence. 😎

innerEcho.question: {name} walks into a crowded party where you barely know anyone. Your instinct screams...
innerEcho.englishHint: What does your authentic self want in uncomfortable social settings?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Ek party mein pahunch gaye jahan kisi ko nahi jaante. Andar se first reaction kya aaya? Sachcha jawab do. 🎉😰

options.text: Corner mein khade hoke sabko observe karna hai 👀
Food/drinks counter - strategic position pakdo 🍕
Smile karke conversation start karo - andar se darte hue 🎭
Phone nikalo - busy hone ka natak karo 📱

innerEcho.question: {name} has started 12 different hobbies this year but completed none. This pattern makes you feel...
innerEcho.englishHint: How does your diverse interest pattern affect your self-identity?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Har hafte naya hobby shuru karte ho, par complete kuch nahi karte. Iss pattern se khud ke baare mein kaisa feel hota hai? 🎨🎸🏃‍♂️

options.text: Renaissance soul - variety is my superpower 🌈
Scattered and unfocused - concentration issues 🧩
Explorer not a master - enjoyment is the goal 🎨
Building a unique skill combination for future 🔮

innerEcho.question: If someone were to truly describe {name} to others, they'd probably say...
innerEcho.englishHint: How do you think others genuinely perceive your personality essence?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Agar koi tujhe deeply jaanta hai, toh woh doosron ko tere baare mein kya batayega? Teri personality ka saar kya hai? 🧿👁️

options.text: "Complex but rewarding - worth the effort to know" 📖
"New version every time - mood ke hisaab se personality" 🎭
"Calm surface with fascinating depths - ocean type" 🧠
"Entertaining but exhausting - energy vampire" ⚡

innerEcho.question: At 3AM, when {name} can't sleep, the thoughts that haunt you most are about...
innerEcho.englishHint: What existential concerns dominate your private thoughts?
innerEcho.hinglishHint: Aadhi raat ko neend nahi aa rahi. Dimaag mein kaunse thoughts ghoom rahe hain? Woh darr ya tension jo kisi ko batate nahi? 🌙💭

options.text: Regrets and missed opportunities - time running out 🕰️
Existential purpose - main yahan kyun hoon? 🌌
Analyzing social interactions - kya maine kuch galat kaha? 👥
Creative ideas and possibilities - future ke plans 💫
